languages.text: {n}Ухватившись за шанс покинуть проклятые копи, часть каторжан ополчилась против мятежников и пришла на помощь надзирателям. Каждый из них грезил о свободе и, если повезет, службе на борту корабля Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ухватившись за шанс покинуть проклятые копи, часть каторжан ополчилась против мятежников и пришла на помощь надзирателям. Каждый из них грезил о свободе и, если повезет, службе на борту корабля Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Clinging to the chance of leaving the accursed mines , some of the convicts have turned against the rebels and come to the aid of wardens.{/n}
{n}Clinging to the chance of leaving the accursed mines , some of the convicts have turned against the rebels and come to the aid of wardens.{/n}

{n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

{n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

languages.text: {n}为了抓住这个机会，彻底离开这片被诅咒的矿井，一部分囚犯背叛了叛军，加入了守军这边。他们每个人都梦想着自由，甚至渴望有幸能在行商浪人的船上服务。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}为了抓住这个机会，彻底离开这片被诅咒的矿井，一部分囚犯背叛了叛军，加入了守军这边。他们每个人都梦想着自由，甚至渴望有幸能在行商浪人的船上服务。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al ver la oportunidad de abandonar las malditas minas, algunos de los convictos se volvieron contra los rebeldes y se unieron al bando de los vigilantes. Todos soñaban con la libertad o incluso con la gran fortuna de servir a bordo de la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al ver la oportunidad de abandonar las malditas minas, algunos de los convictos se volvieron contra los rebeldes y se unieron al bando de los vigilantes. Todos soñaban con la libertad o incluso con la gran fortuna de servir a bordo de la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}呪われた鉱山から離れる絶好の機会をつかんだ受刑者の中には、反乱軍を裏切って看守側に寝返った者もいた。彼らはそれぞれ、自由になることを夢見たり、ローグトレーダーの船で奉仕する幸運が訪れることを夢見ていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}呪われた鉱山から離れる絶好の機会をつかんだ受刑者の中には、反乱軍を裏切って看守側に寝返った者もいた。彼らはそれぞれ、自由になることを夢見たり、ローグトレーダーの船で奉仕する幸運が訪れることを夢見ていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Saisissant l'occasion de quitter ces mines maudites, certains détenus se retournent contre les rebelles pour rejoindre les rangs des contremaîtres, chacun d'eux rêvant de liberté, voire de servir à bord du vaisseau {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Saisissant l'occasion de quitter ces mines maudites, certains détenus se retournent contre les rebelles pour rejoindre les rangs des contremaîtres, chacun d'eux rêvant de liberté, voire de servir à bord du vaisseau {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In der verzweifelten Hoffnung, die verfluchten Minen verlassen zu dürfen, wandten sich einige der Sträflinge gegen die Rebellen und schlossen sich der Seite der Aufseher an. Ein jeder von ihnen träumte von der Freiheit oder sogar von der großen Ehre, an Bord des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} dienen zu dürfen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In der verzweifelten Hoffnung, die verfluchten Minen verlassen zu dürfen, wandten sich einige der Sträflinge gegen die Rebellen und schlossen sich der Seite der Aufseher an. Ein jeder von ihnen träumte von der Freiheit oder sogar von der großen Ehre, an Bord des Schiffs {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} dienen zu dürfen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Uğursuz madenlerden kurtulma fırsatını duyan mahkûmlardan bazıları, isyancılara karşı gelerek gözetmenlerin saflarına katıldı. Her biri özgürlük hayali kuruyor, hatta Hür Tacir'in gemisinde hizmet verme lütfuna nail olmayı diliyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Grasping at the chance to leave the accursed mines, some of the convicts turned on the rebels and joined the overseers' side. Each of them dreamt of freedom or even the great fortune of serving aboard the Rogue Trader's ship.{/n}
